mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (category_seq, type_seq, title, contents) VALUES (#{categorySeq}, #{typeSeq}, #{title}, #{contents});
INSERT INTO posts (user_seq, category_seq, type_seq, title, contents) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{categorySeq}, #{typeSeq}, #{title}, #{contents});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM posts WHERE seq = #{seq} AND user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT pc.category, p.title, u.nickname, p.create_date as createDate, p.view_count as viewCount FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_seq = u.seq LEFT JOIN post_categories pc on p.category_seq = pc.seq WHERE p.type_seq = #{typeSeq} LIMIT #{page}, 10

SELECT pc.category, p.title, u.nickname, p.create_date as createDate, p.view_count as viewCount, u.icon as userIcon, p.type_seq as userType FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_seq = u.seq LEFT JOIN post_categories pc on p.category_seq = pc.seq WHERE p.seq = #{seq} AND p.type_seq = #{typeSeq}
